Digital Forensics

We care about what matters to you

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”tel:3179511100″ button_text=”We Can Help: (317) 951-1100″ button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.8)” button_bg_color=”#ffba60″ button_border_width=”12px” button_border_color=”#ffba60″ button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”4px” button_font=”|700||on|||||” button_icon=”$||divi||400″ global_colors_info=”{}” button_border_radius__hover=”0px” button_border_radius__hover_enabled=”on” button_letter_spacing__hover=”4px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Welcome Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”75px||51px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-10px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”8px||17px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#4c4c4c” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”19px” header_line_height=”1.7em” width=”84%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|64px||||” custom_padding=”9px|||||” animation_direction=”left” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Digital forensics is a disciplined branch of forensic science that focuses on the recovery, analysis, and cataloging of digital data specifically for investigative purposes. This often involves delving into information stored on electronic devices, smart devices, cloud drives, and other forms of computer technology. Most modern digital systems contain a kind of “black box” of data that can serve as a goldmine of insight for a wide variety of case types. At Lauth Investigations International, we specialize in Computer and Cellular Forensics to uncover these critical digital clues.

A computer forensics investigator or digital forensic examiner can recover vital documents, photos, emails, hard drive contents, and other forms of digital evidence. Our digital private investigators are trained to probe deep into devices and networks, retrieving files that may have been deleted or hidden. Whether for personal matters, litigation, or corporate concerns, a targeted digital investigation can yield vital information.

Our experts also specialize in mapping a Subject’s digital footprint, tracking where they were active online, what websites they visited, and which devices were used. With years of experience, our cyber forensic investigators conduct thorough data forensics procedures that stand up to scrutiny in court or corporate review.

Recognized among trusted digital forensics companies, Lauth Investigations International brings precision, confidentiality, and technical expertise to every case.

Lauth private investigators and intelligence analysts exercise the highest degree of due diligence in the digital forensic process, beginning with identifying the location where data is stored, followed by the preservation of the data, and then combing it for a comprehensive analysis for purposes of establishing its overall context. At the conclusion of a digital forensics investigation, our qualified staff prepares detailed reports documenting the full breadth of the data with informational summaries to meet our clients’ fact-finding needs. Perhaps most importantly, our team goes the extra mile to document and preserve the chain of custody regarding all digital data to pave the way for any subsequent litigation following the investigation.   

While digital forensic investigations are often associated with cybercrime, the real-world applications of digital forensics can be very diverse.  

Digital forensic applications:

  • Vehicle crash data recovery & analytics
  • Traffic accident reconstruction 
  • Electronic data recovery
  • Corporate incident response

 

 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Request Appoinment Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://lauthinveststg.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/law-firm-08.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”230px||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|33px||55px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Contact Us

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
